entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:02 p.m. CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
